about.title: About me
about.textDescription1: Hello! My name is Dmytro, I am a Front-end Developer.
about.textDescription2: I like to look for interesting solutions for accomplishing tasks I am facing and, together with my ideas, implement them in the form of websites and user interfaces. In addition, I am constantly developing in this sphere, since perfection knows no limits :)
about.textDescription3: Validity of the code, complete adaptability of the content, the accuracy and readability of the layout or components as well as the use of the most relevant cutting-edge technologies are crucial cornerstones of my work.
